name: 廖思涵
objective:
本課程旨在提升學生之漢語口語表達能力，瞭解台灣社會現況，並與各國之情形類比。
This course aims to enhance learners' ability in oral presentation. Besides, broaden learners' understanding of Taiwan, and then compare with their own countries.
